extendedInfo.description: "One of the most entertaining mobile games Iâve played in a long time" - Indie Games Channel "A fun pick up if you love the series or you're after a quirky new distraction" - AppSpy, 4/5 "Itâs a great way to obtain some laughs, or manifest anger at trying to blow up Sam Stone" - The Speed Gamers, 8.0/10 ********************************************** Description:Remove your head, grab some bombs, and step into the boots of Serious Samâs most iconic foe, the Headless Kamikaze. Dodge hazards and heavy ordinance from the cowardly Serious Sam himself as you make your way through the chaotic action in an attempt to do what you do best: blow up the vile Serious Sam. AAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH! BOOM! ***NOW ONLY 99 CENTS FOR THE HOLIDAYS***Features Mobile Kamikaze Action â Direct your kamikaze horde toward certain death in more than 40 levels of mobile action. Either fall at the hands of Serious Samâs bombs and rockets or go out in an honorable blaze of glory in the service of Lord Mental. Super Sleek Art â Colorful hand-drawn artwork distracts you from the underlying truth: your little kamikaze friend is destined to die in a horribly violent explosion. Cartoon dismemberment has never been so pretty. Savage Bonus Modes â Take a shot at kamikaze immortality by posting a top score on one of the endless bonus levels like Complete Chaos and Frog Punt. Social Media Integration â Spam your friendsâ Facebook feeds with your high scores, people love when you do that. Trust us. Sweet Juicy Credits â A list of credits for the game featuring first and last names. Boosh!-XPERIA PLAY Optimized

reviews.title: Mindless fun
reviews.comment: Just like the other Serious Sam games, you can\'t take this too seriously. Its all about running, jumping, and kicking to blow Sam up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: The only thing wrong with this game is that Sam is running AWAY from the attacking hordes.  Runs awesome on Asus Transformer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome but flawed
reviews.comment: I love this game, it\'s great for passing time and addictive.  Why am I giving it 1 star? Because it crashes A LOT and the controls can be unresponsive at times, and that really sucks. I\'d ask for a refund but I hope the nice developers (um...I hope they are nice) will fix these problems one day *sigh*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes upon loading first screen,I am disappoint trial worked fine but full version doesn\'t :(. Garmin-Asus A-50
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Fun simple game. Shouldn\'t have iOS only achievements. Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: very fun to play : P
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Not revolutionary or anything but certainly a nice little game. Well worth the money imo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great time waster
reviews.comment: This game is good. You should play it. That is all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Time consuming. luv it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Truly awesome hidden gem. One of the best time waters in the market. SGS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very fun!
reviews.comment: Great addition to the indie series full of laughs and explosions!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This Game Has Ads.
reviews.comment: Ads In A Paid App? Paid For App, Shouldn\'t Need Stupid \"Gravy\". Get Rid Of BS Gravy, Get 5 Stars. No Paid App Should Have Ads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Only played for a few minutes, but great nonetheless. Sweet idea from an established IP. Reminds me of the actual games, great for on-the-go. SGS 2.2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addicting and funny
reviews.comment: Game has a decent amount of extras, some nice sprites, and lots of levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s kind of fun
reviews.comment: I guess I expected a little more but it seems to be just running along trying to achieve the secondary goals before you inevitably catch up to Sam and blow him up. No real challenge yet. Runs well on Droid Incredible. Ok game overall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game, but I miss Sam
reviews.comment: Now I wish to play as Sam. Serious shooting from a bird view. Dual Stick shooter.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Awesome! Sounds, music, and graphics from Serious Sam! Fun gameplay! HTC Vision/G2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: A great little game. Well worth the $1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Factually incorrect
reviews.comment: Factually incorrect as Sam would never run from danger, awesome game though, well worth the price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jared
reviews.comment: Fantastic game for fans of the Serious Sam series
reviews.author: A Google User
